name: Lights Out UA
description:
Lights Out is a puzzle game consisting of a grid of windows that are either lit up or off. Clicking on any light turns it off. The goal of the game is to turn off all the lights.

Regulations:

Clicking a windows will toggle it ( on to off, off to on ) it will also toggle the 4 windows next to it ( on the left, right, above, and below it )

Author:

Liza and Lemon indie games

Music author: 

opengameart.org/users/tad

F2 - Movie Mode
